# Node modules
node_modules/

# Logs
logs/
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Cache & temporary files
*.cache
tmp/
dist/
build/

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Editor folders/files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp

# Dependency lock files (optional)
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
